寓.definition: (bound form) to reside; to inhabit; (bound form) residence; dwelling; (bound form) to imply; to place; to contain (sth abstract)

寓居.definition: to make one's home in; to reside in; to inhabit

寓意.definition: moral (of a story); lesson to be learned; implication; message; import; metaphorical meaning

寓意深遠.definition: the implied message is deep (idiom); having deep implications

寓意深長.definition: to have profound import (idiom); to be deeply significant

寓教於樂.definition: to make learning fun; to combine education and entertainment

寓管理於服務之中.pinyin: yù guǎn lǐ yú fú wù zhī zhōng
